CFHDB - CosmicFusion Hardware Database
* Command Line Arguments:
= Program Arguments =
-h | --help: Displays this message.
-v | --version: Gets the program's version.
-j | --json: Displays output as in JSON format.
= PCI Arguments =
-lpd | --list-pci-devices: Lists all PCI Devices.
-lpp | --list-pci-profiles: Lists all PCI Profiles.
-ipp | --install-pci-profile {profile codename}: Installs the specified PCI profile. 
-upp | --uninstall-pci-profile {profile codename}: Uninstalls the specified PCI profile. 
= USB Arguments =
-lud | --list-usb-devices: Lists all USB Devices.
-lup | --list-usb-profiles {profile codename}: Lists all USB Profiles.. 
-iup | --install-usb-profile {profile codename}: Installs the specified USB profile. 
-uup | --uninstall-usb-profile {profile codename}: Uninstalls the specified USB profile.
